verses.text: Moreover, when ye shall divide by lot the land for inheritance , ye shall offer an oblation unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, an holy portion of the land : the length \add shall be\add* the length of five and twenty thousand \add reeds\add*, and the breadth \add shall be\add* ten thousand. This \add shall be\add* holy in all the borders thereof round about.\f + \fr 45.1 \ft when…: Heb. when ye cause the land to fall\f*\f + \fr 45.1 \ft an holy…: Heb. holiness\f*

Of this there shall be for the sanctuary five hundred \add in length\add*, with five hundred \add in breadth\add*, square round about ; and fifty cubits round about for the suburbs thereof.\f + \fr 45.2 \ft suburbs: or, void places\f*
And of this measure shalt thou measure the length of five and twenty thousand , and the breadth of ten thousand : and in it shall be the sanctuary \add and\add* the most holy \add place\add*.

The holy \add portion\add* of the land shall be for the priests the ministers of the sanctuary , which shall come near to minister unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and it shall be a place for their houses , and an holy place for the sanctuary.
And the five and twenty thousand of length , and the ten thousand of breadth , shall also the Levites , the ministers of the house , have for themselves, for a possession for twenty chambers. \p

¶ And ye shall appoint the possession of the city five thousand broad , and five and twenty thousand long , over against the oblation of the holy \add portion:\add* it shall be for the whole house of Israel. \p

¶ And a \add portion shall be\add* for the prince on the one side and on the other side of the oblation of the holy \add portion\add*, and of the possession of the city , before the oblation of the holy \add portion\add*, and before the possession of the city , from the west side westward , and from the east side eastward : and the length \add shall be\add* over against one of the portions , from the west border unto the east border.

In the land shall be his possession in Israel : and my princes shall no more oppress my people ; and \add the rest of\add* the land shall they give to the house of Israel according to their tribes. \p

¶ Thus saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Let it suffice you, O princes of Israel : remove violence and spoil , and execute judgment and justice , take away your exactions from my people , saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.  +  r 45.9  t exactions: Heb. expulsions *
Ye shall have just balances , and a just ephah , and a just bath.
The ephah and the bath shall be of one measure , that the bath may contain the tenth part of an homer , and the ephah the tenth part of an homer : the measure thereof shall be after the homer.
And the shekel \add shall be\add* twenty gerahs : twenty shekels , five and twenty shekels , fifteen shekels , shall be your maneh. \p
This \add is\add* the oblation that ye shall offer ; the sixth part of an ephah of an homer of wheat , and ye shall give the sixth part of an ephah of an homer of barley :

Concerning the ordinance of oil , the bath of oil , \add ye shall offer\add* the tenth part of a bath out of the cor , \add which is\add* an homer of ten baths ; for ten baths \add are\add* an homer :

And one lamb out of the flock , out of two hundred , out of the fat pastures of Israel ; for a meat offering , and for a burnt offering , and for peace offerings , to make reconciliation for them, saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 45.15 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*\f + \fr 45.15 \ft peace…: or, thank offerings\f*
All the people of the land shall give this oblation for the prince in Israel.\f + \fr 45.16 \ft shall…: Heb. shall be for\f*\f + \fr 45.16 \ft for: or, with\f*

And it shall be the prince’s part \add to give\add* burnt offerings , and meat offerings , and drink offerings , in the feasts , and in the new moons , and in the sabbaths , in all solemnities of the house of Israel : he shall prepare the sin offering , and the meat offering , and the burnt offering , and the peace offerings , to make reconciliation for the house of Israel.\f + \fr 45.17 \ft peace…: or, thank offerings\f*

Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; In the first \add month\add*, in the first \add day\add* of the month , thou shalt take a young bullock without blemish , and cleanse the sanctuary :

And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offering , and put \add it\add* upon the posts of the house , and upon the four corners of the settle of the altar , and upon the posts of the gate of the inner court.
And so thou shalt do the seventh \add day\add* of the month for every one that erreth , and for \add him that is\add* simple : so shall ye reconcile the house.
In the first \add month\add*, in the fourteenth day of the month , ye shall have the passover , a feast of seven days ; unleavened bread shall be eaten.
And upon that day shall the prince prepare for himself and for all the people of the land a bullock \add for\add* a sin offering.

And seven days of the feast he shall prepare a burnt offering to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, seven bullocks and seven rams without blemish daily the seven days ; and a kid of the goats daily \add for\add* a sin offering.
And he shall prepare a meat offering of an ephah for a bullock , and an ephah for a ram , and an hin of oil for an ephah.

In the seventh \add month\add*, in the fifteenth day of the month , shall he do the like in the feast of the seven days , according to the sin offering , according to the burnt offering , and according to the meat offering , and according to the oil.
